title.rendered: LB ONE Restaurant & Cocktail Lounge – Lounge in Atlantic City NJ, USA

content.rendered:
Lounge in Atlantic City NJ, USA

LB ONE Restaurant & Cocktail Lounge – Lounge in Atlantic City NJ, USA Address | Phone number | Email | Location | Opening hours, Amenities | Facilities

Address:
LB ONE Restaurant & Cocktail Lounge,
6605 E Black Horse Pike, Egg Harbor Township, NJ 08234, USA

Opening hours: Monday 4 – 10PM, Tuesday 4 – 10PM, Wednesday 4 – 10PM, Thursday 4 – 10PM, Friday 4 – 11PM, Saturday 4 – 11PM, Sunday 3 – 9PM.

Phone number:
1 609-645-7655

Email: contact@lb-one.biz

View location of LB ONE Restaurant & Cocktail Lounge – Lounge in Atlantic City NJ, USA on google maps

LB ONE Restaurant & Cocktail Lounge – Lounge official website: http://www.lb-one.biz/

Atlantic City International Airport FAA Code: ACY

Atlantic City International Airport ICAO Code: KACY

Atlantic City International Airport IATA Code: ACY
